mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO devops_ci_job_record(gitlab_job_id, ci_pipeline_record_id, name, stage, status, trigger_user_id, started_date, app_service_id, maven_setting_id, metadata, created_by, last_updated_by, type, gitlab_project_id) VALUES
(#{recordDTO.getGitlabJobId()}, #{recordDTO.getCiPipelineRecordId()}, #{recordDTO.getName()}, #{recordDTO.getStage()}, #{recordDTO.getStatus()}, #{recordDTO.getTriggerUserId()}, #{recordDTO.getStartedDate()}, #{recordDTO.getAppServiceId()}, #{recordDTO.getMavenSettingId()}, #{recordDTO.getMetadata()}, #{recordDTO.getCreatedBy()}, #{recordDTO.getLastUpdatedBy()}, #{recordDTO.getType()}, #{recordDTO.getGitlabProjectId()})
